description: Detects access to DEWMODE webshell as described in FIREEYE report Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: DEWMODE Webshell Access
query: (url.original:*.html?* AND ((url.original:*?dwn\=* AND url.original:*&fn\=*) OR (url.original:*&dwn\=* AND url.original:*?fn\=*)))
